backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing two-bidder auction logic including state management, bidding, selling players, and auction rounds with a secret key.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata describing a feature update requiring rupee-based currency formatting across several frontend files with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all major frontend files detailing their responsibilities in the auction app.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind styles defining OKLCH color variables for light/dark themes and applying global background/foreground settings.
frontend/index.html: HTML entrypoint mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root component controlling navigation between setup, auction, results, and audience screens while storing the secret key.
frontend/src/components/auction/AuctionS: Main auction interface handling bid placement, player selection, auction state display, and secret key–gated actions.
frontend/src/components/auction/Audience: Read‑only live auction view that polls for updates and displays current player, highest bid, bidders, and player status tables.
frontend/src/components/auction/guards.t: Provides validation helpers for auction setup and bidding, ensuring required fields, uniqueness, and budget rules.
frontend/src/components/auction/ResultsS: Displays auction results, showing each bidder's roster, spending, and sales history, with loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/auction/SetupScr: Renders the auction setup form allowing entry of bidder names, player names, and a secret key, with validation and initialization logic.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Defines the main app layout with header navigation, footer, and screen switching for setup, auction, audience, and results views.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on Internet Identity, invalidating related queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuctionQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching auction state and performing auction actions such as initialization, bidding, starting, and selling.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity context and hooks for login, logout, identity persistence, and status tracking.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and theme CSS variables for light and dark modes using a sports-themed color palette.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/utils/backendErrors.ts: Provides utilities to normalize and clean backend error messages into readable text.
frontend/src/utils/format.ts: Defines rupee formatting, player status evaluation, and highest-bidder display helpers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors based on CSS variables, fonts, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature requests, and current state for rupee-based auction updates.
